title: It's Pride in St. Pete!

image.name: PCI Blog Post Its Pride in St Pete
image.alt: PCI Blog Post Its Pride in St Pete

post_content: Its Pride Month all over the world and we couldn’t be happier to live in a city that hosts Florida’s largest LGBTQ+ Pride Festival! Although Pride is all month long, St. Pete will have their major celebration on Friday, June 21st until Sunday, June 23rd. Over 250,000 people attend St. Pete Pride and there are over 7,500 registered parade participants. Cheer on and support Tampa Bay’s LGBTQ+ community while having the time of your life. Lisa Loeb and Rita Ora will be headlining over the weekend and there will be over two-hundred vendors to shop, sip and snack on throughout the festival. The future looks bright in St. Pete and we are proud to help our community honor the past but make strides towards an equal and brighter future for all people. Put on your brightest clothes and celebrate love at this year's St. Pete Pride festival!
post_excerpt: Its Pride Month all over the world and we couldn’t be happier to live in a city that hosts Florida’s largest LGBTQ+ Pride Festival! Although Pride is all month long, St. Pete will have their major celebration on Friday, June 21st until Sunday, June 23rd.
